name: Transfer Circle course completion Tags to KlickTipp
description:
This automation connects KlickTipp with Circle to streamline your community onboarding. Whenever a Tag is assigned in Circle — for example based on a Circle Workflow —the scenario takes the Circle Tag and automatically maps it via the router to one of your KlickTipp Tags and assigns it to the contact.

The template ensures that new Tags coming from Circle are seamlessly assigned into the correct KlickTipp contacts without manual effort.

This flow is ideal for course creators, coaches, membership owners, or any business using KlickTipp and it's Tag based segmentation. It guarantees a smooth and consistent onboarding experience, reduces workload, and avoids delays when for the communication of your Circle community.

By using this template, you maintain a fully automated and reliable bridge between KlickTipp and Circle.
